patthana17.13:4.1: Akusalaṃ hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.13:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.13:5.1: Abyākataṃ majjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.13:5.3: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha … pe … āsevane pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.13:6.1: Kusalaṃ paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.13:6.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
